resources.string: Check your email or SPAM folder to change password

How to use:


• add budget using "+$"
 			• +$3,000 budget for Jan


• add expenses using "$"
 			• $50 eating out
 			• $20 netflix
 			• I owe Mike $20
 			• amazon refund -$50
 			• Rent $1500


• organize expenses by utilizing sub-lists
 			• Apartment Expenses
 			• 			↳ Rent $1000
 			• 			↳ Water $40
 			• 			↳ Electricity $97


See screenshots below (click to expand):

No Budget Found (Try it Out)
 Click on Info icon to learn more…
Dark Note is free and has no ads \nYou can support me by buying me some much needed coffee or leaving an honest review, even if it is a 1 ⭐

Icons from Flaticon
 www.flaticon.com

Messages
 https://github.com/Spikeysanju/MotionToast


Loading Images
 https://github.com/bumptech/glide


Color Picker
 https://github.com/QuadFlask/colorpicker


Pop up Menu
 https://github.com/skydoves/PowerMenu


Image Picker
 https://github.com/Dhaval2404/ImagePicker


Date Picker
 https://github.com/wdullaer/MaterialDateTimePicker


Lock Screen
 https://github.com/aritraroy/PinLockView


Bottom Sheet
 https://github.com/Deishelon/RoundedBottomSheet 


Formatting Notes

Circular Buttons
 https://github.com/Clans/FloatingActionButton


Loading Indicator
